content: I'm looking for reviewers for #81404. It changes parser to improve an error message. Who should I ping for this kind of parser PRs?

You can wait until the next weekend when the current assignee has time, or you could consider re-assigning to someone on wg-diagnostics. That team currently has:

JohnTitor
davidtwco
estebank (lead)
oli-obk (lead)

I would avoid assigning to estebank too much because they get tons of PRs assigned.
